FuncDef: This command configures the referenced Ethernet port as a loopback or a cross-connect port (PXC). Once this command is executed, the system automatically creates two PXC sub-ports under this Ethernet port. The two PXC sub-ports are logical configurations used by the node to transmit traffic bi-directionally through a single physical port that is internally cross-connected.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the physical port in the slot/mda/port format.
